00002 package documentclassifier.Metriche;

00004 import java.util.Comparator;
00005 import java.util.HashSet;
00006 import java.util.LinkedList;
00007 import java.util.Map;
00008 import java.util.Map.Entry;
00009 import java.util.Set;
00010 
00022 public class DistanzaBhattacharryaComparator implements Comparator<Entry<Map<String,Object>,Map<String,Double>>> {
00023     
00038     public int compare(Entry<Map<String,Object>,Map<String,Double>> A, Entry<Map<String,Object>,Map<String,Double>> B) {
00039         
00040         double distanzaA=(Double) A.getKey().get("Distanza");
00041         double istanzaB=(Double) B.getKey().get("Distanza");
00042         if( distanzaA > istanzaB ) {
00046             return 1;
00047         }
00048         else if ( distanzaA == istanzaB ) {
00049             return 0;
00050         }
00051         else {
00052             return -1;
00053         }
00054     }
00055     
00070     public static void calcolaDistanza(LinkedList<Entry<Map<String, Object>, Map<String, Double>>> documentSet, Map<String, Double> query) {
00071         
00072         Map<String,Double> istogrammaCorrente;
00073         Set<String> intersezione;
00080         for(Entry<Map<String,Object>,Map<String,Double>> documentoCorrente : documentSet ) {
00081             
00082             double Somma=0.0;
00083             istogrammaCorrente=documentoCorrente.getValue();
00090             intersezione=new HashSet<String>();
00091             intersezione.addAll(istogrammaCorrente.keySet());
00092             intersezione.retainAll(query.keySet());
00093             for ( String Token : intersezione ) {
00094                 Somma = Somma + (Math.sqrt(query.get(Token) * istogrammaCorrente.get(Token)));
00095             }
00096             documentoCorrente.getKey().put("Distanza", new Double(Math.sqrt(1-Somma)));
00097         }
00098     }
00099
